name: Pearls of Wisdom
description: Pearls of Wisdom is a unique startup company founded following the initiative of the late Shimon Peres for the advancement of nanotechnology in Israel; Pearls of Wisdom develops novel monitoring systems based on an Ultra-Low-Power, Ad-hoc network of hundreds of miniaturized sensors (UGS) of various types (acoustic, visual, radar and others) and unique miniature sensor drones for special applications.
